alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 05 at 2:25PM MDT until November 07 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, with the strongest gusts south of I-80, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
